1.content:
Watching the show Naruto you've always wondered what it would be like to be in that village.

To see and experience what they go through, to have those people as friends.

Those were your thoughts as you closed your window browser and got ready for bed. Putting on some headphones to listen to music while you slept you lied down in bed and pulled up the covers.

"Man that would be awesome", was the last thing you said before passing asleep.

About an hour after you fell asleep, your computer suddenly reopened the internet browser to a bizarre website.

After it opened the screen's light started to get brighter and brighter until it started to fill up the whole room!

Being woken up by the bright light you pull off you headphones and look over at the blinding light.

"What the hell?" You mumbled, stumbling out of bed while shielding your eyes you make your way to the computer, the light only getting brighter the closer you got.

Right before reaching the computer it gets so bright you can't even see anymore! The light is making your eyes sting and water.

A moment later a feeling of complete weightlessness hit's you, sending you into a panic.

As quickly as it came the light was gone and the feeling of being weightless was gone too. Being left with black spots in your vision you take a minute to rub your eyes clear and take a look around.

You turn ghostly pale as you see a GIANT wood flooring stretched out for miles! In the distance you see four walls that extend to the heavens.

Having enough sense to realise that nothing of this size could possibly exist you come to the conclusion that you've shrunk! And judging by the room it looks like your in someone's bedroom.

But whose?

While you were in deep thought you suddenly hear the fridge door slam with a loud boom. Startled, you look up at see Naruto put his hands on his hips and glare at the fridge angrily.

“Damn it! There’s nothing to eat; not even a cup of ramen!” Naruto exclaimed. The orange ninja suddenly spins around and starts walking again.you look up to see Naruto's feet almost hit you you had no choice but to flatten youself on the ground.Not wanting him to get out of sight, you try to chase after him. A small bug like you trying to catch up with a huge titan like Naruto doesn’t go very well, however. you’re barely getting anywhere while Naruto gets farther and farther away from you with each booming step. Luckily, he doesn’t decide to go far and sits down at the kitchen table. Naruto rests his elbows on the table and sighs heavily. “So hungry…” Naruto touches his gut and feels it rumble with hunger. Despite running for what seemed like a mile, Naruto still looked so far away. Does he?

11122.content:
"Then again" said Naruto, " I am really bored so I'll make crushing ya a little 'fun'." Naruto chuckled as he began to plot on just exactly how he was going to crush the insect before him..

"Congrats little bug you get to be squished under my godly feet, which one you might ask well lets just find out with a little jog."

When Naruto to stops talking you are practically soaking in sweat for the fear of what he could do to you without much effort on his part. The blond then turns around and away from you.

"Okay now we will see which one it will be."

He slowly stomps his feet on the ground while making his way over to you. The booming noise his foot falls are creating is deafening you. Turning around, you spot the door of the apartment at the end of a hallway; with no moment of thought you start to run down the hallway to get away from him but the door seems several dozen miles away. You start running, running like you’ve never ran before. You can hear the massive booming getting closer and closer.
To your shock one of the footsteps was so close to you that the massive BOOOM it created flipped you off your feet and made you crash down hard on the wood
floor and skid a few inches.

You start to get on up your knees as one of the giant black sandals slams down just feet away to your left sending you spiraling to the right several inches. You roll onto your back as Naruto’s shadow encompasses, he gives you a cheeky grin before speaking one last line.
“You bugs are so annoying, I hope at the very least that you’ll make a nice crunching sound!” The smile never left his face as he lifted his right foot over you.
Knowing that there was no escape you just stared up at his smiling face feeling it calm your nerves. The expression seemed to be saying that he was thanking you for letting him crush you like the bug he thought you were. His blue crystal eyes and smiling face was soon replaced by the giant black sandal as he slowly lifted his foot over you and stepped down on to your bruised form.

Snapping from you fascination horror and fear at an inhuman level returns to you and you make one last attempt to shout out to him.
“NARUTO WAI!-AUUUGHA” you were cut off as part of the foot slammed down on your lower half- issuing a blood curdling scream from you. You vision was almost black as the foot lifted giving you one last bit of light from the outer world and time seemed to slow down as it lifted. You could feel the tred that had severed you lower half from you but had also saved you from instant death lift up pulling the rest part of you with it. You see the other treds of the sandals move slightly into your vision before the whole foot moves forward and places only the heel in your view. You could see bits of dirt and grime on the heel before it descended for the final time.The back of the sandal landed about a foot away from the bloody remains of your legs. the heel The started moving down and covered the remains bit by bit until it reached the part of your body that still has feeling. Your screaming at the top of your lungs as the sandal stops.

“Don’t disappoint me now little bug!” You hear Naruto yell as light floods your vision. You see Naruto has jumped several feet in the air. You get to see Naruto's childish smile one last time before he came crashing on top of you. The foot smashes you in as it connects and every wave of pain goes through you at once in that one instant as your body goes with big audible ‘pop’ and sprayed blood all over the bottom of Naruto’s sandal.

“Heh crushing the bug as worth it” Naruto smiled deviously as he lifted his foot and inspected the bottom sole. only to notice it covered in red blood. “Dang that’s alot of blood for a bug” he said while grabbing a tissue and whipping his sandal and floor clean of the mess. Not thinking twice he throws the bloody thing in the trash before heading out the door to try and nick some food from his neighbors.

1212.content:
Looking around, you find that the wood floor your standing on is part of what looks like a tidy and organized bedroom. Looking at the posters on the walls (That stretched to miles above you) You guessed your in a males room.

In the distance you hear the sound of of what sounds like a soft thunder storm. Moving around you see a bed so big that it dwarfs the empire state building! It looks like a bed ment for a God.

Speaking of which, from your position on the floor you can see what looks like a giant mountain covered by a blanket large enough to cover a city.

Focusing you hear that the soft thunder is coming from the blanket. You pale at the realization that there's a being currently occupying the massive bed.

After a few minutes of regaining your composure you decide that just standing out here in the middle of floor will get you nowhere you start to come up with a plan of action.

You have several options

First you could try to awaken the giant person on the bed with hopes of getting help.

Second you could get to higher ground and wait for him to wake up and hopefully notice you.

Lastly you can avoid the giant altogether and try to find another way to get back to normal.

Each plan has their risks and rewards which path will you take.
1212.title: Boruto

Deciding to get the guys attention will be tricky.

Want to go and wake him up on the bed?

Or Climb the nightstand and wait by his alarm clock hoping he see's you?
12121.title: Get the persons attention

choices: Try shouting at Boruto hoping it wakes him.
Try causing an itch or irritation to wake him.
121211.content:
"Okay I have no idea how long this guy might be asleep so it will probably be easier to go and wake him up myself." You reasoned before starting the trek on over the the bed where a corner of the blanket had fallen to the floor from the bed top.

Getting over to it you grip the fabric of the blanket and rejoice as the material wasn't to smooth, allowing you to easily climb it. The wrinkles in the blanket also helped with the climb

After about ten minutes of climbing you reach the top of the mattress and pull yourself on to the giant bed.

You freeze in shock at what lies before you.

There is a Giant teenager laying on the bed!

He was wearing a pink shirt with a pair of what appear to be boxers, You've pulled yourself up to the guys waist line. Walking forward slowly you stop a foot (in your perspective) away from the point where the shirt and boxers meet.

"Here I go"

You grab onto the shirt and start shimming up it until you've managed to pull up onto the guys belly.

Looking down the expanse of the shirt you see a head with a bit of what looks like blonde spikes coming from the far side of it.

'Hmm must be a blonde' you mused as you started walking along the belly of the giant.

Trying to walk along the giant's stomach was proving difficult fairly quickly as the constant rising and falling motion from the giant's breathing was throwing off you balance.

After making past his stomach you reach the chest, at this point the rising ans falling of the giant's breath was a lot smoother and easier to walk on, as you got closer you could also begin to hear the giant's breathing coming from up ahead. Picking up you pace you jogged the rest of the way to the end of the giant pink shirt and met with the giant's bare neck region.

Stepping onto the giant's skin you were greatly surprised by how warm it is, you continue your way to the giant's chin with no problem. Reaching said chin you quickly scale up it hoping you not causing and itch on the giant you standing on.

Getting to the top you freeze and stare at the extremely familiar face of the one and only Boruto Uzumaki!

"There's no freaking way!" you whisper out loud.

No way could the giant Ninja Boruto actually be real, let alone this freaking huge!

Stuck in a half shocked trans you stumble forward only to be pulled back to reality when your foot steps down off of skin and down a few inches onto something wet and hard causing you to fall back on your butt.

Shaking your head you realized you just almost walked right into the mouth of the blonde giant and just slipped on one of his teeth.

Quickly scooting away from the huge carnivorous maw, you try to catch your breathe and shake off the fear of almost becoming mincemeat inside the mouth of one of you favorite anime characters.

While regaining your breathe you deiced the best way to try waking him up.
121211.title: Get on the bed

1212112.content:
After catching your breathe you deiced that the best way to get Boruto to wake up is to try to cause an irritation. Thankfully with how sensitive the human face is it shouldn't be to hard to find a way to get the job done. Looking over the surprisingly soft and blemish free landscape you see Boruto's whiskers and notice that they are actual small hairs instead of just weird birth marks so pulling one from his cheek might do the trick, but runs the risk of Boruto swatting you with is palm or ripping you to pieces under the giant nails on his fingers.

There is also the same risky route of perhaps yanking a hair from one of his eyelids, if he opens his eyes before rubbing them though you unmissable standing right in front of his eyes.

You could also (While it would be rather gross) go and cause him to sneeze and jolt him awake.


Which one to try.
1212112.title: Try causing an itch or irritation to wake him.

12121121.content:
With how close the whiskers were to you, you figured the easiest thing to do was to pull on Boruto's facial hair.

Standing up from the blondes lip you scoot over to his right cheek and grab onto one the hairs.

"Okay here we go!" you shout giving it a hard tug.

Sadly your efforts were't able to yank the hair free but did turn the skin around the follicle and angry red.

"Damn!, No luck one more time" you yell grabbing it again.

Before you could pull however, a giant shadow over took your entire area catching your attention.

Looking up you shout with no other way to react as Boruto's giant hand came down onto you from above with fingers extended!

You have no time to react as Boruto's finger nails slam into you! You scream in pain as his nails grind you into nothing more than a small blood spot under his whisker.

...
...
...

Boruto opens his eyes slowly in greeting of the morning. He go's to let out a yawn and as doing so feels a very sharp pinch under one of whiskers and gives it a quick scratch, not hearing you scream or feeling your body being obliterated under his finger tips.

Going about his routine he throws off his covers and sleepily walks to the bathroom and starts to brush his teeth as he glances into the mirror he finally notices the speck of blood on his cheek.

"Hmm guess I got a bug right as it bit me? Oh well the stupid thing was just lucky it wasn't turned into a carcess under my
foot."

Not giving it another thought Boruto strips and hops into the shower, turning it on hot at full blast.

Within just a few seconds of the stream of hot water hitting him, your remains were washed off of Boruto's cheek and fingers and taken to their finally resting place in the pipes of the Uzumaki house,

The blonde never realized that the 'Bug' he had so carelessly and unknowingly scratched out of existence was a human simply trying to get his help.

To fight and contain external bacteria...
